name: .FSC File Extension
summary: Learn about .FSC files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An FSC file is a script created by Practical Scriptwriter, a script formatting application for stage, screen, TV, and radio. It is saved in a simple text-based format that can be instantly reformatted for any type of media.

content: FSC files are similar to word processing documents, but they use a special layout designed for character lines. They also support outlines, script statistics, and other data not included in a typical text file.
NOTE: Practical Scriptwriter is designed for creating scripts for the US and UK markets.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
